short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple and clean task manager extension for organizing tasks.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Task Manager Extension helps you stay organized by allowing you to create and manage tasks directly in your browser. You can add tasks for specific tabs or globally across all tabs, track progress as tasks move from 'To Do' to 'In Progress' and 'Completed', and delete tasks with ease. The extension has a clean, modern interface, and tasks are saved so you can pick up where you left off in future sessions. Whether youâ€™re juggling multiple projects or just keeping track of daily tasks, Task Manager Extension simplifies your workflow.
